features: MOISTURIZING SHAMPOO: Dove Ultra Care Daily Moisture Shampoo with pump is specially designed to give your hair essential daily care, leaving it looking beautiful and healthy
FOR DRY HAIR: This shampoo deeply moisturizes dry hair, nourishing each strand to leave it soft and smooth
WITH BIO-RESTORE COMPLEX: This hydrating shampoo is formulated with our Bio-Restore complex for complete care that works in harmony with your hair
HOW TO USE: Apply this nourishing shampoo to wet hair, lather and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Ultra Care Daily Moisture Conditioner. Suitable for daily use
DAILY MOISTURE: Dove Daily Moisture is a moisturizing shampoo and conditioner system that makes hair soft, smooth, and manageable
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This shampoo for dry hair is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove
body.description: To help prevent the visible damage done by daily wear and tear, Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo with pump progressively cares for hair, leaving it feeling healthier when used as a part of a system along with Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner. After the very first wash, this moisturizing shampoo for dry hair helps to nourish and protect your hair from daily aggression, giving you silky, soft hair that's up to 10x more resilient when using system vs. non-conditioning shampoo. This Dove shampoo contains a unique formulation with Bio-Nourish Complex that smooths and progressively cares for hair deep inside. Even though you'll notice you're looking smoother after the first wash, Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo continues to nourish hair after each application, helping to make your hair feel healthier wash after wash. Its nourishing formula helps to form a shield around the hair fiber to protect it from daily damage, maintaining your hair's natural balance without weighing it down. After one shower, you'll feel that your hair is silky to the touch and easy to manage. How to use: Apply Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo to wet hair, lather and rinse.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Giving you manageable and silky hair that feels beautifully soft, Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo looks after damage with kindness. This moisturizing shampoo delicately cares for your hair, cleansing each strand to keep them soft and protected every day.

Daily Moisture This Dove Daily Moisture haircare system is specially designed to give your hair essential daily care, making it soft, smooth and manageable. Bio-Restore Complex Dove Daily Moisture, with Bio-Restore Complex, works with hair's surface to smooth and protect where it's most vulnerable and stops daily damage due to breakage. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Real Beauty is Cruelty-Free Dove care goes beyond just hair. This shampoo is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection - just check out its PETA cruelty-free certified logo. Plus, we are moving all our bottles to 100% recycled plastic.

Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner, 31 oz Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo, 31 oz Dove Coconut & Hydration Shampoo, 31 oz Main Benefit Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner moisturizes for soft, smooth, and manageable hair. Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo visibly reapirs damage to regenerate the healthy look and feel to hair. Featuring a fresh coconut water and sweet lime scent, Dove Coconut & Hydration Shampoo locks in moisture for soft, smooth, and beautiful hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Makes my scalp really itchy
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo made my scalp really itchy.I couldn't stop scratching all day I was embarrassed at work I even made myself bleed by scratching too much. I stopped using it and I started using other shampoos and my scalp felt relief as soon as I used a different shampoo. This shampoo is not a good safe shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Shampoo; Overbearing Fragrance
reviews.reviewText: I didn't purchase this on Amazon, but I thought patrons should know the fragrance has changed over the past couple years. I use a different brand of moisturizing shampoo and conditional, and it works very well, but after I've used it for a couple months, it leaves a residue on my hair, so I have used Dove Daily Moisture to cut through the build up. Because I only use it occasionally, it lasts a long time. When I went to replace it this time, I found that Dove has changed from the light fresh fragrance to a potent, overpowering fragrance. My hair smells of it until I wash it again. My pillow now smells of it. My hands smell of it. In my position where I work closely with students every day, I don't wear perfume out of deference to those with asthma. Sadly, now my shampoo and conditioner can bring on an asthma attack! Guys who have shared their wife's shampoo and conditioner may not want to smell like a bottle of cheap cologne and may want to switch shampoo now. What was Dove thinking?!?
